# Package A

A simple package with basic utility functions for addition.

## Installation

```bash
poetry add package-a
```

## Usage

```python
from package_a.core import hello_from_a, add

# Print a greeting
print(hello_from_a())  # Outputs: Hello from Package A!

# Add two numbers
result = add(5, 7)
print(result)  # Outputs: 12
```
